sqlMap.select:
select waitingorder_id, order_from, batch_msg, kind, code, seat_code, name, people_count, mobile, tel, reserve_date, memo, total_price, real_price, shopname, address, pay_mode, pay_type, pay_memo, outfee, card_entity_id, card_id, pay_id, advance_pay, advance_seat_pay, pay_status, reserve_seat_id, reserve_time_id, status, hide_status, reserve_status, audit_status, order_id, deal_message, errormessage, sender, sender_id, customerregister_id, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, out_id, out_type, ext from waitingorderdetail
order by $orderByClause$

select aa.waitingorder_id AS waitingorder_idorder_from, batch_msg, kind, code, seat_code, name, people_count, mobile, tel, reserve_date, memo, total_price, real_price, shopname, address, pay_mode, pay_type, pay_memo, outfee, card_entity_id, card_id, pay_id, advance_pay, advance_seat_pay, pay_status, reserve_seat_id, reserve_time_id, status, hide_status, reserve_status, audit_status, order_id, deal_message, errormessage, sender, sender_id, customerregister_id, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, out_id, out_type from ( select waitingorder_id from waitingorderdetail
order by $orderByClause$
limit #skip#,#pageSize#
) bb inner join waitingorderdetail aa on aa.waitingorder_id=bb.waitingorder_id

select aa.waitingorder_id AS waitingorder_id $cols[].name$ from ( select waitingorder_id from waitingorderdetail
order by $orderByClause$
limit #skip#,#pageSize#
) bb inner join waitingorderdetail aa on aa.waitingorder_id=bb.waitingorder_id

select waitingorder_id, order_from, batch_msg, kind, code, seat_code, name, people_count, mobile, tel, reserve_date, memo, total_price, real_price, shopname, address, pay_mode, pay_type, pay_memo, outfee, card_entity_id, card_id, pay_id, advance_pay, advance_seat_pay, pay_status, reserve_seat_id, reserve_time_id, status, hide_status, reserve_status, audit_status, order_id, deal_message, errormessage, sender, sender_id, customerregister_id, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, out_id, out_type, ext from waitingorderdetail where waitingorder_id = #waitingorderId:VARCHAR#
